002.comments: ARCL 325 - PaleoanthropologyThis advanced course provides students with insight into the origins and evolution of the human lineage. Through lectures, readings and specimen-based labs, students will learn about the origin and development of the hominins, the hominin fossil record, and theories relating to hominin evolution.

description: Origin and development of the hominins; the hominin fossil record, and theories relating to hominin evolution.
